name: ext-web-crawl
description: Robots (RFC 9309) + Sitemaps + deterministic crawl scheduling (pinned via arch/crawl).
docs:
Robots (RFC 9309) + Sitemaps + deterministic crawl scheduling (pinned via arch/crawl).

Modules:
- std.crawl.robots
- std.crawl.sitemap
- std.crawl.urlnorm
- std.crawl.schedule
- std.crawl.fetch
- std.crawl.fetch.os
- std.crawl.tests

Usage:
- Add dependency: x07 pkg add ext-web-crawl@0.1.2
- Pin crawl policies in arch/crawl.
- Parse robots: std.crawl.robots.parse_v1 + std.crawl.robots.allowed_v1.
- Parse sitemaps: std.crawl.sitemap.parse_urls_v1.
- Plan: std.crawl.schedule.plan_v1.
- Fetch + RR replay: std.crawl.fetch.replay_rr_v1.
- Fetch + RR record: std.crawl.fetch.os.run_rr_v1 / std.crawl.fetch.os.run_rr_missing_v1.
